_meta.description: Parametric CAD variables for Craft Room layout

axes.x: West to East (left to right) - 30' LONG DIMENSION
axes.y: South to North (front to back) - 15' SHORT DIMENSION

_meta.orientation: Long walls horizontal, short walls vertical

room._notes: 30ft wide x 15ft deep = 450 sq ft main. Long walls are horizontal. Open edge is south (30' long). Back wall is north (30' long, exterior).

bump_out._notes: 8ft wide x 4ft deep bump-out extending north beyond back wall. Opens from right 8' of back wall. Fume/finishing zone.

circulation._notes: Kayak lane runs E-W utilizing up to 25ft of 30ft width. Main aisle runs parallel to open wall.

cabinet_run_back_wall._notes: Back wall cabinetry stops at bump-out (22ft run)

cabinet_run_left_wall._notes: Left wall cabinet run in clean zone (8ft)

zone_receiving.name: Receiving / Material Stage
zone_receiving._notes: Front left (SW corner) - sheet goods entry from open wall, vertical rack, lumber stage

zone_clean.name: Clean Zone (Melissa + Electronics)
zone_clean._notes: Left side (west) - Melissa's bench, PC station, electronics, 3D printing, Cricut. 10ft x 8ft

zone_dusty.name: Dusty Zone (Breakdown + CNC)
zone_dusty._notes: Center-right - breakdown table, CNC bay, sanding, dust collection. 13ft x 13ft

zone_packship.name: Pack / Ship Bench
zone_packship._notes: Front right (SE corner) - one-way flow terminus, easy access to open wall for shipping

zone_fume.name: Fume / Finishing (Bump-Out)
zone_fume._notes: 8x4 bump-out on back wall right side. Coatings, adhesives, resins. Dedicated exhaust to exterior. NO open flame.

zone_cabinetry.name: Back Wall Cabinetry
zone_cabinetry._notes: Back wall from left to bump-out (22ft cabinet run)

zone_kayak.name: Kayak Lane / Assembly
zone_kayak._notes: E-W corridor for kayak assembly - 23ft clear run. Also serves as main circulation.

melissa_workbench_phenolic._notes: 6ft phenolic top assembly bench in clean zone

electronics_bench._notes: Seated work height, ESD-safe surface, microscope + rework

breakdown_table._notes: 8ft x 4ft phenolic + T-track + dogs for track saw

cnc_bay._notes: 4x4 machine. For 4x8 tiling, feed stock from front (south).

vertical_sheet_rack._notes: 4x8 sheet storage, vertical, in receiving zone

lumber_rack._notes: Long stock horizontal storage along wall

dust_collector._notes: Near back wall in dusty zone, close to CNC

soft_dust_barrier._notes: Between clean (west) and dusty (center/east) zones. Airflow: west to east.

hvac._notes: Make-up air from south (open wall). Fume exhaust through bump-out north wall.

do_not_regress: NO wood stove or open-flame heat source
NO dusty operations in clean zone
Aisles must not go below 36in minimum
Kayak lane must remain clear of permanent stations
One-way material flow: receiving -> breakdown -> CNC -> finish -> pack
adjacencies: Clean zone on west, upwind from dusty zone
Sheet goods receiving adjacent to breakdown table
Fume zone in bump-out, isolated with dedicated exhaust
Pack/ship at front right for easy exit via open wall

_assumed_measurements: All station dimensions are reasonable defaults - verify before build
